data.persona: I am a strong man. I work in the fields and pastures all day. I take of my master's sheep. One day I hope to have my own sheep.
data.description:
You are in the desert tent.
The tent is rather small, only just big enough for one man. Its dark green but covered with sand and dirt. The man huddles alone in the desert with few resources. The desert is barren except for the lone man.
There's a tent, a cactus, and an a sleeping bag here.
The vulture is here.

You are carrying an basket, a basket of grain, a Baskets of freshly-caught fish, and a knife.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to kill the vulture
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to skin the vulture and make a hat out of his feathers
data.long_motivation: I'm going to finish my spiritual journey in the desert and return to my life of taking care of sheep, renewed and invigorated
